ygData.subject: Re: Guk Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sean, I was there yesterday or the day beofre with my level 17 warrior, a level 19 cleric, and 20 druid, and we were able to do it.  The giant heart
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 20 May 1999 Sean.Clark@... wrote:

> From: Sean.Clark@...
>
> I am about to hit lvl 13 and was thinkin about trying for the chitin shield.
> I I get together a strong group do we have a shot?
> To get to the Spider(s) do you go into the water from the room with the two
> frogs that spawn that is close to the entrance? The one where the big croc
> hangs out? I've seen some spiders over that way, but I was only level 8 and
> it looked KINDA dangerous!

Sean, I was there yesterday or the day beofre with my level 17 warrior, a
level 19 cleric, and 20 druid, and we were able to do it. The giant heart
spider, which dropped the shield, wasn't that bad, but was a very rare
spawn. The majority of the time a large heart spider spawns, and is much
tougher than the giant which has the shield. We had a couple really close
calls with it. I wouldn't recommend trying it unles you have a party that
can heal and you're pretty high up there in levels because of the mobs of
spiders and the intensity of the poison.

Good luck to ya

Nick
